mods.abstract: Abstract design of swirling lines, weaving in and out of each other. Form is composed of five "E" shaped organic, rounded forms interlocking on different planes and in different directions. Four pairs of spirals are arranged loosely corresponding to the four corners of the central mass. The image is in various shades of gray and black, and the line has various textures, rough and smooth.
